com.illumina.basespace
Interface BaseSpaceSession

public interface BaseSpaceSession

Defines the operations that can be performed against the BaseSpace API

Author:
bking

download

void download(File file,
              File targetFolder)
Download a file to local folder. The destination file will have the same name as the source file.

Parameters:
file - the file to download
targetFolder - the target local folder
progressListener - an optional implementor of the DownloadProgressListener interface that wishes to track progress of the download

Returns:

chromosome - the chromosome to query
params - the variant fetch parameters
